channel.title: Sever rule help
channel.description:
ok well i got into were i make the rule (following ultimate server guide)
it says to add this stuff: Name: (desired name) IP address: (computers ip) TCP Ports to open: 43594 UDP Ports to open: Inbound Filter: Allow All Schedule: Always
but my rule making thing looks like: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img151.imageshack.us/img151/3856/severhelp2em7.png[/img][/URL]
i need to know what go's where etc
